Features:
- Destroy enemies with a perfect performance, playing for a professional killer monsters. It has a mutagenic elixirs, combat magic and an arsenal of deadly weapons of various types, the characteristics of which may be increased.
- Hunt the many incredible monsters from violent creatures that live in the mountain passes, to the tricky monsters lurking in dark alleys crowded cities.
- Use earned money to improve weapons and armor to order, or to descend at the races, in fist fights, playing cards and having fun.
- Travel to fantastic outdoor world, explore the abandoned ruins, caves and shipwrecks, trade with merchants and blacksmiths krasnolyudskimi cities , hunt on the plains, in the mountains and the sea.
- to negotiate with the military leaders vile, horrible witches and corrupt rulers and help them in the most dark and dangerous things.
- Make decisions that go beyond the choice between good and evil, and be prepared to face their consequences.
